400.description:
Bad Request	
 Error Code | Description 	
ROLE1000 | Invalid operator role code 	
 AUTHORITY1001 | At least one operator admin should exist in account 	
 AUTHORITY1004 | User is not related to account 	
 AUTHORITY1008 | Authority status in not valid 	
 AUTHORITY1012 | User role can not be modified 	
ACCOUNT_CONTACT1001 | You must have a primary contact on your account 	
ACCOUNT_CONTACT1002 | You must have a financial contact on your account 	
ACCOUNT_CONTACT1003 | You must have a service contact on your account 	
ACCOUNT_CONTACT1004 | You cannot assign the same user as a primary and secondary contact on your account 	
ACCOUNT_CONTACT1005 | You cannot assign an Emitter Contact as primary contact on your account 	
ACCOUNT_CONTACT1006 | You cannot assign an Emitter Contact as secondary contact on your account
